item.title: Share image along with caption on WhatsApp
item.description: So I came across thisquestion on StackOverflow asking how one can share an image on WhatsApp along with a caption. Before the question could be answered, two users incorrectly marked it as a duplicate. So I thought of sharing my answer here so that it can help out others. We start by creating an ACTION_SEND Intent since the Intent sends data Intent intent = new Intent(); intent.setAction(Intent.ACTION_SEND); We set the Intent type to image since we are primarily sending an image
